message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair.  Slightly more than half seems reasonable since I get to propose next if you decline.
I'll compromise, but still a bit in my favor
We're running out of time, and the pot is shrinking. I'm coming down a little, but this is my final offer.
Getting desperate? I'll give you a little more, but not too much
This is it, Alice. A straight 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.  Any more rounds and we both lose out.
